effect.ruby_sapphire: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.emerald: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.colosseum: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.xd: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.emerald: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Creates a black haze that eliminates all stat changes.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates a black haze that eliminates all stat changes.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Eliminates all stat changes among all POKéMON engaged in battle.
